name: Space Governor Bradford
description:
A game made during Train Jam 2017. This game is mostly broken, but this blog post details its development and all of the art and narrative missing from the final jam game: https://www.joncoughlin.com/space-governor-bradford

Space Governor Bradford is ready to go door-to-door and win some votes :D

Credits:

Bradford Dobbs - Score, Acting, Audio
Jeremiah Watts - Dialog System, Programming
Katie McCarthy - Textures, Programming
Oda Sandaker - Modeling
Adrian Ihle - Programming, Modeling
Jon Coughlin - Writing, Programming
Jacob Koonce - Acting

Patch 1 - Day 1 fully functional: Governor Bradford now gives his speech!
